Package me.dnorris.pool.data.hitbox.implementation

Class AbstractLocationHitbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dnorris.pool.data.hitbox.implementation.AbstractLocationHitbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hitbox
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleLocationHitbox, EmptyHitbox, HollowRectangleLocationHitbox, RectangleLocationHitbox
    public abstract class AbstractLocationHitbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hitbox
    Abstract implementation of the Hitbox interface that uses a Location as the center point. Abstract class used to reduce repeated code in more specific implementations

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Description copied from interface: Hitbox
        Each Hitbox type will have a priority which determines which Hitbox should handle the collision. Therefore, higher priority Hitboxs will handle the collisions.
        Specified by:
        getPriority in interface Hitbox
        Returns:
        The priority of the hitbox
